item.title: Skyfactory 4
item.description: Note This list is current as of the time of writing this but might not always be up-to-date. Take advice here with that knoweldge. Important Rules Our Skyfactory 4 server has some additional rules on the server apart from the general rules you find on all our servers. Max of 2 Hopping Bonsai Pot per sappling type per island. Truffles drop as an item. Ensure you collect them properly. As an improtant note, do not build a 1 chunk bases or farms.
